::DrillBit::

DrillBit saw Testifer threaten KitKat. He walked up to him.
"Fuck you!" he said, throwing a punch, at Testifer's face.
"How dare you point a gun, at my love!"

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod walks outside, and up to ArcAngel, Kamodia, and Quake.
"Hey all, whats up?" He askes.
